pages.title: Death
pages.text: When youn die, you will leave behind a $(item)Gravestone/$ which will hold on to all of your items. Breaking the $(item)Gravestone/$ will return your items to your inventory.$(br2)A $(thing)Waypoint/$ will also be added to your $(thing)Map/$ at the location of your death to help you find your way back.

pages.title: Diet
pages.text: When you die, you will lose a flat $(bold)50%/$ progress in each $(bold)$(l:food/diet)Diet/$ category, regardless of what percentage you had when you died.
